name: UpdateIncidentWorkflow
description:
Updates an existing incident workflow in PagerDuty.

Use this tool to update an incident workflow, which includes configurable steps and triggers for executing automated actions on an incident. Requires appropriate OAuth permissions.

parameters.name: incident_workflow_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the incident workflow to update.

parameters.name: versioning_header_accept
parameters.description: Specifies the API version to use for the request through the 'Accept' header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: The format of the request body. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: incident_workflow_data
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the incident workflow configuration to update, including steps and triggers.
